FuncDef: This command specifies the source address and application.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the application name. Values-cflowd, dns, ftp, ntp, ping, ptp, radius, snmptrap, sntp, ssh, syslog, tacplus, telnet, traceroute, mcreporter, icmp-error.
Specifies the name of the IP interface or IP address. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed between double quotes.
